long_description: MurmurHash is a non-cryptographic hash function suitable for general hash-based lookup. The function output the hashed value of each cell in the input columns.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The input table that contains the data.
input_tables.description: The input table that contains the data.

argument_clauses.name: InputColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the input table columns for which to calculate hash values. Note: NULL values in the input columns are output as NULL.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the input table columns for which to calculate hash values. Note: NULL values in the input columns are output as NULL.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the input table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the input table columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: HashBit
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies whether the function generates 32-bit hash values (the default) or 64-bit hash values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether the function generates 32-bit hash values (the default) or 64-bit hash values.
